Params[3]: When I went to look for food, I went into a food processing plant.
There's something off about the factory. It's empty, but it's still operating.
I climbed over a noise barrier and entered the factory. The noise from the machines was deafening.
Countless Tai'E and Guardians were hanging on the production line and moving along a huge machine.
They were pulverized and flattened into scrap metal on the work bed.
The duty of Tai'E is to protect humanity.
Robots obey orders. The highest command of Tai'E is to protect mankind. All Tai'E are the same—simple and easy to understand.
But you have always been different. I never know what you're going to do.
I never hated you. I'm not installed with an emotion module, so I can't like or hate.
I just feel... unaccustomed around you, and confused.
G3... Sorry. For a moment, I wavered and had doubts about the point of my existence in the world.
I feel that there is malice and confrontation in this world.
But I have also felt that... humans... are full of goodwill and are worthy of protection.
So this time, I'm not executing orders because of my programming.
But because I want to. That's why I chose this human. Because this human being is special to me...
I'll protect her at all costs.
